import Delete from"../images/Group.svg";import vector2 from"../images/Vector2.svg";import React from'react';import{CurrentUserContext}from'../context/CurrentUserContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(_ref){var link=_ref.link,name=_ref.name,likes=_ref.likes,owner=_ref.owner,onCardClick=_ref.onCardClick,onCardLike=_ref.onCardLike,onCardDelete=_ref.onCardDelete,cardId=_ref.cardId;function handleClick(){onCardClick({link:link,name:name});}var currentUser=React.useContext(CurrentUserContext);function handleClickLike(){onCardLike({likes:likes,cardId:cardId});}function handleDeleteClick(){onCardDelete({owner:owner,cardId:cardId});}var isOwn=owner._id===currentUser._id;// Создаём переменную, которую после зададим в `className` для кнопки удаления
var cardDeleteButtonClassName="element__delete ".concat(!isOwn?'button_visibility':'');var isLiked=likes.some(function(i){return i===currentUser._id;});var cardLikeButtonClassName="element__like ".concat(isLiked?'element__like_active':'');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button_type_delete",onClick:handleDeleteClick,type:"button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,src:Delete,alt:"\u0423\u0434\u0430\u043B\u0435\u043D\u0438\u0435"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button button_type_image",onClick:handleClick,type:"button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"element__image",src:link,alt:"\u041A\u0430\u0440\u0442\u0438\u043D\u043A\u0430"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element__group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"element__title",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element__like_groupe",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button_type_like",type:"button",onClick:handleClickLike,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:cardLikeButtonClassName,src:vector2,alt:"\u041B\u0430\u0439\u043A"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"element__like_number",children:likes.length})]})]})]});}export default Card;
